newsitem.title: FRANCE: France would consider Mobutu asylum request -Juppe.
newsitem.headline: France would consider Mobutu asylum request -Juppe.

text.p: France would consider a request for asylum from the ousted president of former Zaire Mobutu Sese Seko, but has not received any, French Prime Minister Alain Juppe said on Friday.
"France has received no request from Marshal Mobutu," Juppe told France-Info radio.
"We would look into it," he added when asked what he would do if he received such a request.

Mobutu, who owns a mansion on the French Riviera and a flat in Paris, flew to Morocco on Friday. He had left the renamed Democratic Republic of Congo earlier this week after Laurent Kabila's rebels overran Kinshasa.
